summary: Craft all the recipes that were left out by Bethesda. (Soon to be updated to include armor and weapons from Heathfire and Dawnguard.)
descriptionHtml:
Craft all the recipes that were left out by Bethesda. (Soon to be updated to include armor and weapons from Heathfire and Dawnguard.)

Introduction:
I, and assuredly almost every member of this site, used one of the old mods that did the same that my mod does now, but they have been long since abandoned. I set out to make my own version. I could likely have simply contacted one of the old authors and added onto their mod, but I wanted to do it myself to gain experience. This is my first mod, but it is still a very useful mod. Hopefully you\'ll like it.

PS: This doesn\'t yet include Hearthfire or Dawnguard items because I don\'t have either DLC. I\'m getting it this Christmas and I\'ll update the mod accordingly.

What does this mod do?
This mod just adds missing recipes in a lore friendly way. You can\'t craft legendary artifacts, but you can craft many pieces of clothing, weapons, and armor that you could not before. Additionally, you will need to \"unlock\" guild faction armor in order to be able to craft it.

[b]>Main File[/b]
Recipes:
All (or almost all) clothes
Silver Sword
Silver GreatSword
Thieves Guild Armor
Thieves Guild Leader Armor
Companions Armor
Falmer Armor and Weapons
Forsworn Armor and Weapons
Imperial Weapons and Missing Armor
Blades Weapons and Armor
Nightingale Armor and Weapons
Headsman\'s Axe and Clothes
Worn Dark Brotherhood Armor
Guard\'s Armor
Scimitar
Fork
Knife
Pickaxe
Axe
Lockpicks
Forsworn Arrows
Falmer Arrows
Nord Hero Arrows

Tempering:
SilverSword
SilverGreatsword
Studded Imperial Armor
Headsman\'s Axe and Clothes
Worn Dark Brotherhood Armor

Small changes:
Imperial armor can only be made if you join the imperials
Stormcloak armor can only be made if you join the stormcloaks
Studded armor was moved to leather
Executioner\'s clothing has an armor rating

[b]>Optional Arrow Smithing Plugin[/b]
Adds arrow smithing for arrows that are already covered in Dawnguard.

Some of the clothing pieces may not work with females, but that is caused by Bethesda, not me.
Also, if there is anything I missed (I had to have missed at least one article of clothing) please let me know in the comments.

SPOILERS(How to unlock certain equipment):
Most of these also require the steel smithing perk.
Thieves guild armor: Join the Thieves Guild
Thieves guild leader armor: Become leader of the Thieve\'s Guild
Companion\'s armor: Join the Circle
Falmer armor and weapons: Dwarven smithing perk
Forsworn Armor and Weapons: Side with the Forsworn in their questline
Imperial Officer\'s Helmet: Complete Rescue from Fort Kastav in the Imperial Legion civil war questline
Stormcloak Bear Armor: Complete The Battle for Fort Snowhawk in the Stormcloak civil war questline
Blades gear: Kill Paarthurnax
Guard\'s Armor: Become thane of that hold
Dark Brotherhood: Join the Dark Brotherhood
Nightingale: Join the Nightingales
Nord Hero Arrows: Complete the Companions questline

Feel free to cover this mod in a Youtube mod spotlight or something similar.

Also check out my other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28649/][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28649-1-1356052783.png[/img][/url]
If you know how to resize this, let me know!
author: ThomasEston
